title: Michael Sampson
text:
I work as a data scientist/analyst/etc.
I compost over at Abyssinian Tot Lot in Harlem. Recently “certified” as a master composter.
I take care of some street trees near me from time to time as a NYC super steward.
I am working my way through Marie Simmons’ The Good Egg over at @the pretty good egg
photo: Hide, 2019 from Julia Chiang’s Spit Sweat Shhh exhibit at The Modern Institute, Glasgow (link)
